Our goal is to prepare new food entrepreneurs to scale their business, allowing them to increase their revenue and hire employees within six months of completing the program. I work with five students on a one-on-one basis to teach thru my personal first hand knowledge.
7051 E. 5th Ave., Suit W, Scottsdale, AZ 85251

The Herb Box has deep roots in high-end artisanal catering because that is where we started in 1995. The exciting part is we are still partying with our innovative food all over the valley. So if you’d like to share some epicurean bliss with your guests, staff, clients, or potential clients, simply have your next event catered by The Herb Box Catering Company. Offering a full range of price points on our menu and the full event coordination, you will only need to make one call. We will handle the food, the staff, the rentals, the florals, the décor, the valet, the AV & lighting and any other part you may need to throw your special event. An “event” doesn't necessarily mean hundreds of guests either! Whether you are thinking about a sit-down dinner for 12, a wine tasting dinner for 20, a swanky cocktail party for 50 or a fundraiser for 1000; the Herb Box Catering Company will provide an experience that will linger in the memories of your guests long past their last bite and exit.We take pride in our ability to offer a wide range of culinary creations with an emphasis on freshness, quality and visual excitement. Call us today and let us turn your next gathering into a special event!

I made spaces beautiful, functional, exciting, and fun through design & decor. Pacific Event Productions has been in the valley of the sun for over ten years and has been an innovative leader in event design. I worked with everything from small social events, weddings, launch parties and big splashy corporate events. The key to great event design is to not design a single event but  environmental spaces where people can have a human experience. It is the first impression of the event and next to food will leave the longest lasting impression. I made sure everything was well thought out for flow, branding, and functionality of every event leaving guests dreaming about the possibilities!

GLSEN is the nation's leading education organization working to make all schools safer for all students regardless of perceived sexual orientation or gender identity / expression. GLSEN works with educators, policy makers, community leaders and students on the urgent need to address anti-LGBT behavior and bias in schools. GLSEN strives to protect students from bullying and harassment, to advance comprehensive safe schools laws and policies, to empower principals to make their schools safer, and to build the skills of educators to teach respect for all people.

summary: Michael has been working in hospitality and events for over 25 years. Through innovative event design and smart planning, he sets the stage for people to make life long memories and host successful branded events. Michael feels an event should not be boring and expected, even corporate events, they should all be exciting, creative, and fun, yet functional. He prefers to think out of the box and provide something that no one has ever seen or tasted before. Winning the Best Event Design & Decor Zonie in 2013 was an honor. He has taken those talents and fused them with his extensive food and wine knowledge to bring him where he is today at The Herb Box Catering Company. He feels an event should have an interesting visual and emotional schematic built through design, decor, food, beverage and always interesting entertainment. Michael's events are never boring, but provide the guest with interest from their first impression to their last moment of revelry. Specialties: Food, Wine, Event Decor, Event Coordination, Entertainment, Flow and Function
